paragraphs: I'm a dedicated Computer Science student with a passion for creating impactful software solutions. My journey in programming began with curiosity and has evolved into a commitment to excellence in software development.

With experience in full-stack development, I enjoy working on projects that challenge me to think creatively and develop efficient, scalable solutions. I'm constantly learning and adapting to new technologies, frameworks, and methodologies.

Beyond coding, I'm interested in open-source contributions, hackathons, and collaborative projects that make a difference. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following industry best practices.

highlights.title: Education
highlights.description: Pursuing Computer Science with a focus on software engineering and algorithms

highlights.title: Development
highlights.description: Building full-stack applications with modern frameworks and best practices

highlights.title: Problem Solving
highlights.description: Passionate about tackling complex challenges with elegant solutions

highlights.description: Always exploring new technologies and staying current with industry trends
